technology:
Add status.[App].io as a resource and add 'statusio_key' as a property. To find the key, go to 'https://status.[App].us/api/v2#summary', expand the example, and look for the key in the url 'https://[key].statuspage.io/api/v2/summary.json'.
If the FQDN is not key.statuspage.io, this version of the DS will not work.
name: StatusIOServiceStatus

collectorAttribute.name: batchscript

method.name: ad_script

dataPoints.name: Status
dataPoints.description:
Status of the particular service.

Status codes:
0=operational,
1=degraded performance,
2=partial outage,
3=major outage
